Package  Class  Use  Tree  Deprecated  Index  Help 
 PREV PACKAGE   NEXT PACKAGE FRAMES    NO FRAMES    

Package edu.bu.segrelab.comets

Interface Summary
CometsConstants A handy way to avoid having to write CometsConstants.XXXXX over and over throughout the program - just have most of the classes implement this.
 

Class Summary
AbstractTool An abstract tool class for use with the CometsSetupPanel.
Cell The basic, abstract Cell class for use with the COMETS program.
Comets The base class for running the COMETS program.
CometsInfoFrame This is the basis for an information-filled JFrame used by the Comets program.
CometsLoader The CometsLoader class is the interface between the Comets class and any packages that do the hard work of simulations (e.g., those classes in the edu.bu.segrelab.comets.fba package).
CometsMenuBar A JMenuBar extension to handle the main menus in COMETS.
CometsParameters This implements a set of global parameters used throughout the COMETS program.
CometsRunPanel The CometsRunPanel does all the heavy programmatic lifting of running the simulation.
CometsSetupPanel The CometsSetupPanel has the role of letting the user initialize and customize the contents of the world before running a simulation.
CometsToolbarPanel This implements a toolbar for use with the CometsSetupPanel.
DataContentPanel An extended JPanel that contains an editable list of names and values.
DoubleField A JTextField extension that only allows double values to be entered into the box.
EraserTool The EraserTool is a part of the tool palette used in modifying the initial layout in the CometsSetupPanel.
FillTool The FillTool is a part of the tool palette used in modifying the initial layout in the CometsSetupPanel.
GradientTool The GradientTool is a part of the tool palette used in modifying the initial layout in the CometsSetupPanel.
IntField A JTextField extension that only allows integer values to be entered into the box.
JFileFilter A simple FileFilter class that works by filename extension, like the one in the JDK demo called ExtensionFilter, which has been announced to be supported in a future Swing release.
LineTool The LineTool is a part of the tool palette used in modifying the initial layout in the CometsSetupPanel.
Model The abstract base class for a model to be used in COMETS simulations.
PencilTool The PencilTool is a part of the tool palette used in modifying the initial layout in the CometsSetupPanel.
PipetTool The PipetTool is the simplest tool in the toolbar palette.
SelectTool The SelectTool allows the user to do two main tasks:
1.
ShapeTool The ShapeTool is a part of the tool palette used in modifying the initial layout in the CometsSetupPanel.
TextAreaOutputStream A modified output stream that dumps things to a JTextArea with integrated scrollbar.
Utility Implements a number of static utiilty functions.
World2D The World2D is, along with the Model and Cell classes, the main scientific part of the COMETS program.
 

Exception Summary
ModelFileException A ModelFileException is an exception used for issues with a loaded model file (or not loaded, as the exception may be...).
